hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that hidden in a #box in the Water Temple# lies #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #6# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Compass#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Goron Mask# and #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Magic Beans#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Shadow Trial Bomb Flower Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Slingshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: It's so lonely being stuck here with nobody else to talk to...

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple MQ Raised Island Courtyard Lower Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Compass#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Damp's Hut#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ZD (Mweep).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
